Author: Rich Quinnell
Article: AspenCore’s Special Projects are coordinated editorial packages that explore a technology and business topic from a variety of viewpoints to meet the needs of multiple stakeholders in the development and deployment of that technology. From designers to business managers, AspenCore’s audiences will get task-specific insights and guidance for understanding technology and business issues, provided in a collection of cross-linked articles across the international AspenCore network in publications such as EE Times, EDN, Electronic Products, Embedded.com, EBN, EPS (Electronics Purchasing Strategies) News, and others. Each of our Special Projects features an anchor story in a key publication with links to articles in other publications that supplement and expand on the themes of the anchor story.
